about_the_game:
You don't remember how you were transported here, but this was your world now, your restaurant in another world, Isekai-ya.

Your dreams to become a chef took a strange turn, reality seemed to have warped before your eyes and what you see before you just seemed so odd. The buzz of unfamiliar languages, yet weirdly comprehensible.

People of all shapes, colour and sizes; pointy ears and even fluffy warmth..

Yet, in front of you, were unmistakably: A kitchen countertop, stoves, and shelves and larders stocked with colorful ingredients.

Visit different worlds, meet the unique inhabitants

Who would you meet? The cast includes:

  • outgoing, flamboyant Day Elves

  • seductive, sultry Demonkin

  • burly, disgruntled Orcs

  • and so much more!

Not to mention, even in these fantasy worlds, comes a wide variety of flora and fauna at your disposal.

Discover unique ingredients, whip up mouth watering dishes

With a wide variety of ingredients, comes the scrumptious meals that you can make from them.

name: Isekai-ya
short_description: An adorable cooking game where you hop around many worlds, finding new ingredients to whip up new recipes. Get to meet a variety of customers of all races and background as you immerse yourself in the flow and frenzy of running a restaurant.
